text: We as a faith community need to come together and turn our faith into action—because faith without works is dead, and we need to bring this nation back to life. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1163068399444004864/img/HEyFmxILZA424zEr.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1163068399444004864/vid/320x320/WOcYe3mMqOPpwj7D.mp4?tag=13

We spend $80 billion a year locking up 2.2 million people, more than any country on Earth.

That is outrageous.

As president my goal will be to cut the incarcerated population in half.

Ayanna and I are running for president, because that’s what girls do. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ECQbBK9WwAEAQQx.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1163083751884300288/vid/480x270/iXQcey4T-Ort47E-.mp4?tag=13

RT @fshakir Bernie's plan "aims to cut the nation’s prison population in half, end mandatory minimum sentencing, ban private prisons and legalize marijuana. He says the current system does not fairly treat people of color, addicts or the mentally ill." https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/federal_government/sanders-criminal-justice-plan-aims-to-cut-prison-population/2019/08/18/27bc499a-c1bd-11e9-8bf7-cde2d9e09055_story.html

Today I am proud to be releasing the most comprehensive and progressive criminal justice platform of any candidate for president.

We have a criminal justice system that is racist and broken, and working together we're going to fundamentally transform it. https://berniesanders.com/justice-and-safety-for-all/

It’s been 99 years since the 19th Amendment was ratified. Yet the struggle to ensure everyone has equal access to the ballot box continues, especially for women of color. We need to expand early voting, have automatic voter registration, and make Election Day a national holiday.

RT @shaunking This plan from @BernieSanders is the most comprehensive, transformative, robust, serious plan to change America’s justice system ever authored by a political campaign in the entire history of this country. 

And he knows it beginning to end. 

It’s his. 

https://berniesanders.com/justice-and-safety-for-all/

No one should be able to profit from filling our prisons.

Not only must we ban private prisons, we must make phone calls and other communication free of charge and end police departments’ reliance on fines and fees for revenue.

Blessed the man who sets
his security in the LORD,
who turns not to the arrogant
or to those who stray after falsehood.

Psalms 40:5

RT @GunnelsWarren Bernie's criminal justice plan will:

✅Ban for-profit prisons
✅End Cash bail
✅Abolish the death penalty
✅End mandatory minimums
✅End three strikes laws
✅Legalize marijuana
✅End solitary confinement
✅Decriminalize truancy for youth & their parents

https://berniesanders.com/justice-and-safety-for-all/
Cash bail must be abolished. We should not have hundreds of thousands of people in jail simply because they could not afford bail.

The death penalty is cruel and unusual punishment.

It is applied disproportionately to people of color.

It has been proven not to deter violent crime.

The United States must join almost every other advanced country on Earth and abolish the death penalty.

The CFPB student loan ombudsman is supposed to protect students from getting cheated.
